properties.areaDesc: Inland Kenedy; Coastal Kenedy; Zapata; Brooks; Jim Hogg
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 8:47AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog...some locally dense...have developed across
portions of Brooks, Kenedy, Jim Hogg and Zapata Counties.
Visibilities will be reduced into the 1 to 3 mile range generally,
with locally denser fog reducing visibilities to a quarter of a
mile at times. The fog will begin to lift later today as daytime
heating increases.

Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning across
the Northern Ranchlands as visibilities may change rapidly over
short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance
between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering
significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel
to destinations.

NWSheadline: Areas of Fog impacting the Northern Ranchlands.
